DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter study designed to evaluate the response rate of S-1 plus Leucovorin (1 week on and 1 week off) as first -line treatment for patients with metastatic colorectal cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Study of S-1 Plus LV for Untreated Metastatic Colorectal Cancer
